headline: AI company Eightfold sued for helping companies secretly score job seekers
summary: Jan 21 (Reuters) - Eightfold AI, a venture capital-backed artificial intelligence hiring platform used by Microsoft, PayPal and many other Fortune 500 companies, is being sued in California for allegedly compiling ​reports used to screen job applicants without their knowledge. headline: Human Capital Education Acquires Kennedy & Company
